/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is high, providing a bird's eye view of the urban landscape. The street, teeming with life, stretches out below, flanked by buildings on one side and verdant trees on the other. Cars and bicycles, tiny from this height, traverse the road, adding a dynamic element to the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the cityscape. The image is slightly distorted due to the fisheye lens effect, adding a unique perspective to the photograph.
